last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the entire "Argon" team gets busy investigating the Mid Town case, Baek-jin learns of a shocking truth from his past that comes back to haunt him.

name: Argon
overview: In a world filled with provocative (and often misleading) news, a passionate team of investigative TV reporters strives to bring truths to light.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Anchor Kim Baek-jin apologizes for falsely reporting a church corruption, and his investigative news show "Argon" gets demoted to a weeknight program.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Yeon-hwa writes a report on the cause of the Mid Town accident, but no one takes her seriously. Baek-jin gets called into an emergency board meeting.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Violence ensues at the broadcasting station when Yeon-hwa gets sent to meet with an unwelcome visitor, who insists on speaking with Baek-jin.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Everyone at HBC is talking about who the new main anchor of News9 will be. Baek-jin secures an interview with the U.S. Commerce Secretary for "Argon."

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: It's election season -- both at HBC and countrywide. For her next story, Yeon-hwa digs into the relationship between politicians and fortunetellers.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: While at a children's playroom, Cheol runs into Hye-ri, who reminds him of an anonymous post on the "Argon" site about suspicious deaths of infants.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: "Argon" gets accused of false reporting, so Baek-jin and his team prepare a rebuttal. However, their opponent is a big and very powerful corporation.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: As the entire "Argon" team gets busy investigating the Mid Town case, Baek-jin learns of a shocking truth from his past that comes back to haunt him.
